![typpy](http://i.imgur.com/FkoAc5n.png)

# typpy [![Donate now][donate-now]][paypal-donations]

A better typeof for JavaScript.

## Installation

```sh
$ npm i typpy
```

## Example

```js
// Dependencies
var Typpy = require("typpy");

console.log(Typpy(0));
// => "number"

console.log(Typpy(""));
// => "string"

console.log(Typpy(null));
// => "null"

console.log(Typpy([]));
// => "array"

```

## Documentation

### `Typpy(input)`
Gets the type of the input value.

#### Params
- **Anything** `input`: The input value.

#### Return
- **String** The input value type (always lowercase).
